block.p: BMG ENTERTAINMENT, New York, named Kevin Conroy, senior vice president for worldwide marketing and new technology, to the posts of president for new technology and chief marketing officer.

COMMERCEKEY.COM, New York, which offers e-business services, named Greg Brody, president for corporate development, to the post of president, succeeding Pavlos N. Vardinoyannis, who remains chief executive. Also, Eric B. Pullman was named chief operating officer, succeeding Rashid Jamalalldeen, who left. Mr. Pullman had been chief operating officer at CornerDrugstore.com.
BMG ENTERTAINMENT, New York, named Kevin Conroy, senior vice president for worldwide marketing and new technology, to the posts of president for new technology and chief marketing officer.

COMMERCEKEY.COM, New York, which offers e-business services, named Greg Brody, president for corporate development, to the post of president, succeeding Pavlos N. Vardinoyannis, who remains chief executive. Also, Eric B. Pullman was named chief operating officer, succeeding Rashid Jamalalldeen, who left. Mr. Pullman had been chief operating officer at CornerDrugstore.com.
PETRO-CANADA, Calgary, Alberta, named Brian MacNeill chairman, succeeding Jim Stanford, who resigned. Mr. MacNeill had been chief executive at Enbridge Inc., a pipeline and gas utility company.
